body: @FroZ true, Kaeru's art looks quite better, it feels more dynamic and natural compared to his last works and I kinda disagree with Nokoppa doing more yaoi his artstyle doesn't fit such Imo, but yeah it would be nice to see him/her do so. This anthology doujin is kinda meh, soranosuzume, kaeru and nokoppa are the only one's standing out, the rest are just simple and not trying to improve their overall, I'm feeling a 6 on this anthology.
hanamaki kaeru's art looked a bit better in this one. he needs to improve more. nokoppa should just do more yaoi overall i like it when he/she does.
